result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

10:33 AM Defendant Darrell D. Hagamon Sr. in court, in custody from the Vilas County Jail without counsel.  ADA Dennis Brown in court for State of Wisconsin. Court speaks to public defender's office search for an attorney. Bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 11:30 am.

11:03 AM Defendant Darrell D. Hagamon Sr. in court, in custody with the Vilas County Jail without counsel.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin.  Public Defender Office still looking for representation.  Bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 19, 2022 at 10:15 am.
Public Defender Status of Counsel Report - 588

10:45 AM Defendant Darrell D. Hagamon Sr. in court, in custody.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin.  Public Defender still seeking counsel for defendant.  Bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 15, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Public Defender Status of Counsel Report - 588 Contacts

9:57 AM Defendant Darrell D. Hagamon Sr. in court, in custody, without counsel.  ADA Dennis Brown appears in court for State of Wisconsin.  Public defender's office is still seeking private bar counsel for defendant.  Court continues bond.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Public Defender Status of Counsel Report 578

10:40 AM Defendant Darrell D. Hagamon Sr. appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant confirms receipt of complaint.  He will be contacting public defender's office today.  Bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 27, 2022 at 09:45 am.

1:15 PM Defendant Darrell D. Hagamon Sr. appeared by video, in custody, without counsel.  ADA Dennis Brown appears in court for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant confirms receipt of complaint.  Charges read.  Defendant has not contacted the public defender's office. Court advised defendant to do so.  Bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 20, 2022 at 10:30 am.

1:29 PM Defendant appears by video from the Vilas County Jail without counsel.  ADA Dennis Brown appears for the State of Wisconsin.  No complaint filed yet.  ADA speaks to the incident that occurred that resulted in the defendant's arrest. Court finds probable cause. Bond set at $.1000.00 cash.
